header.title: Briefly about myself
header.paragraph: Luka is a front-end developer and freelance from Georgia with a great passion for becoming great developer. He wants to become full-stack developer , but before he started learning front-end. While he is offline , he loves playing video games and drawing sketches. His goal is not simple as just becoming developer , he wants to do more than that...
